00058 typedef enum

00064 
00071 typedef enum
00072 {
00074     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_UNKNOWN       = 0,
00075 
00077     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_ALLOCATED     = 1,
00078 
00079     /* Initial setup work has been done, mamaSubscription_activate must still be called. Note that this state is only valid
00080      * for market data subscriptions.
00081      */
00082     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_SETUP         = 2,
00083 
00084     /* The subscription is now on the throttle queue waiting to be fully activated. */
00085     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATING    = 3,
00086 
00087     /* The subscription is now fully activated and is processing messages. */
00088     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATED     = 4,
00089 
00090     /* The subscription is being de-activated, it will not be fully deactivated until the middleware removal of the listener is complete */
00091     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_DEACTIVATING  = 5,
00092 
00093     /* The subscription has been de-activated, messages are no longer being processed. */
00094     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_DEACTIVATED   = 6,
00095 
00096     /* The subscription is being destroyed, but waiting on deactivation to complete*/
00097     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_DESTROYING    = 7,
00098 
00099     /* The subscription has been fully destroyed. */
00100     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_DESTROYED     = 8,
00101 
00102     /* The subscription is in the process of being de-allocated, but waiting on deactivation to complete*/
00103     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_DEALLOCATING  = 9,
00104 
00105     /* The subscription has been de-allocated. This state is only temporary and exists until such point as the subscription's 
00106      * memory is freed. It is provided so that a log entry will be written out.
00107      */
00108     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_DEALLOCATED   = 10,
00109 
00110     /* The subscription is being re-activated, it will not be fully reactivated until deactivation complete */
00111     MAMA_SUBSCRIPTION_REACTIVATING  = 11
00112 
00113 } mamaSubscriptionState;
00114 
00115 typedef enum
00116 {
00117     DQ_SCHEME_DELIVER_ALL,
00118     DQ_SCHEME_INGORE_DUPS
00119 } dqStartegyScheme;

00125     DQ_FT_WAIT_FOR_RECAP
00126 }dqftStrategyScheme;

00265 typedef struct mamaMsgCallbacks_
00266 {
00267     wombat_subscriptionCreateCB   onCreate;
00268     wombat_subscriptionErrorCB    onError;
00269     wombat_subscriptionOnMsgCB    onMsg;
00270     wombat_subscriptionQualityCB  onQuality;
00271     wombat_subscriptionGapCB      onGap;
00272     wombat_subscriptionRecapCB    onRecapRequest;
00273     wombat_subscriptionDestroyCB  onDestroy;
00274 } mamaMsgCallbacks;
00275 
00280 typedef struct mamaWildCardMsgCallbacks_
00281 {
00282     wombat_subscriptionCreateCB        onCreate;
00283     wombat_subscriptionErrorCB         onError;
00284     wombat_subscriptionWildCardOnMsgCB onMsg;
00285     wombat_subscriptionDestroyCB       onDestroy;
00286 } mamaWildCardMsgCallbacks;
